summary: The diff implements comprehensive bulk task editing functionality across frontend and backend. All four requirements (REQ-88, REQ-89, REQ-90, REQ-91) show evidence of implementation. The TaskBulkEditDialog includes form fields for all 13 task properties with 'Unchanged' sentinel handling, the backend adds bulkUpdateTasks API accepting PartialTaskUpdate[], the useBulkUpdateTasks hook sends partial updates with proper type conversions, and TasksPage wires the dialog with success callbacks. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
